default.LOC: location entities are limited to geographical entities such as geographical areas and landmasses, mountains, bodies of water, and geological formations.
default.ORG: organization entities are limited to companies, corporations, agencies, institutions and other groups of people.
default.PERSON: a person entity is limited to human including a single individual or a group.
default.CARDINAL: Numerals that do not fall under another type
default.EVENT: Named hurricanes, battles, wars, sports events, etc.
default.NORP: Nationalities or religious or political groups.
default.DATE: Absolute or relative dates or periods
default.QUANTITY: Measurements, as of weight or distance.
